question: 入学
sourceMnemonic: You <kanji>enter</kanji> into a <kanji>study</kanji> (place). When does this happen? It happens when you get accepted into a school, aka <vocabulary>school admission</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>university admission</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>entry into school</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
